scripts.build: yarn build:types && yarn build:parser && yarn build:client && yarn build:server
scripts.build:watch: concurrently "yarn workspace @fem-viewer/types build --watch" "yarn workspace @fem-viewer/parser build --watch" "yarn workspace @fem-viewer/client build --watch" "yarn workspace @fem-viewer/server build --watch"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && yarn workspaces run clean
scripts.dependency-graph: madge --image dependency-graph.svg --extensions ts,tsx packages/client/src/ packages/server/src/ packages/types/src/ packages/parser/src/
